ModMetaData.name: Metro Exodus Armory
ModMetaData.author: Meruzmi
ModMetaData.description:
Introduces (almost) every gun from Metro Exodus (and even some from Last Light Redux!) and several variants! CE Required!
Introduces: Pistols: Revolver (5 Variants) Revolver Rifle (2 Variants) Bastard (4 Variants) Lolife
Shotguns: Ashot (1 Joke Variant, 3 Normal Variants) Shambler (3 Variants) Bigun Abzats Saiga
Rifles: Kalash (7 Variants, including Shortened, Redux and RPK variants) Kalash 2012 VSV Bulldog (2 Variants) Valve (2 Variants)
Special Weapons: Tihar Pneumatic Air Rifle Volt Driver Helsing Crossbow
Important note: The guns chamber special "Metro" rounds instead of normal CE bullets. All Metro-made bullets are created at a loading bench
